narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Breakingforth Transportation LLC is a Taxi provider based in Heathsville, VA. From 2024-07 through 2024-12, this provider received $70K in Medicaid payments across 1K claims serving 279 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 3.2× the national median for T2003 (T2003), at $70 per claim vs. the median of $22. This places them well above the 99th percentile nationally.
100% of billing is concentrated in T2003 (T2003), indicating significant specialization in this service.
